title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.5 - Additional branches and agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.5 - Additional branches and agencies

State Regulations
A foreign banking corporation that has received a license
to open and maintain a branch or agency in this State may, unless otherwise
advised by the superintendent, open and occupy an additional branch or agency
with 30 days prior notice to the superintendent. Such notice shall contain the
information required under section
101.3
(b), (l) through (s), (w) and
(z) of this Supervisory

Procedure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
101.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
